BanBao.showColor: Shows all RGB lights to a given color.
BanBao.showColor|param|rgb: RGB color of the RGB light
BanBao.setBrightness: Set the brightness of RGB lights.
BanBao.setPixelColor: Display the given RGB light as the given color.
BanBao.setPixelColor|param|rgb: RGB color of the RGB light
BanBao.setPixelColorRGB: Display the given RGB light as the color corresponding to the given RGB value.
BanBao.closePixelColor: Turn off the given RGB light.
BanBao.motorRotation: Control the forward and reverse rotation of DC motors.
BanBao.motorRotation|param|direction: Direction of rotation of DC motor
BanBao.motorStop: Control the stop of the DC motor.
BanBao.motorStop|param|mode: Select the stop mode of the DC motor
BanBao.ultrasonicJudgeEvent: Execute user events when a given measurement range is detected.
BanBao.ultrasonicJudge: Detect if the given distance range is met.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredRead: Detect if the five infrared sensors meet the given mode.
BanBao.threeWayInfraredRead: Detect if the middle three infrared sensors meet the given mode.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredPidSet: Adjusting the PID value of infrared line patrol.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredProcessingSpeed: Given the intersection processing speed of infrared line patrol.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredPatrolSpeed: Given the basic execution speed of infrared line patrol.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredPidMode: Given the infrared line patrol mode.
BanBao.oneOfFiveWayInfraredDigitalRead: Detect if the single infrared sensors meet the given mode.
BanBao.oneOfFiveWayInfraredAnalogRead: Read the reflection value of a single infrared sensor.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredStraightLinePatrol: Start the linear line patrol of infrared line patrol.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredCrossingLinePatrol: Start the crossing line patrol of infrared line patrol.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredTimeLinePatrol: Start the time line patrol of infrared line patrol.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredCrossingRead: Read the number of crossing that have already passed through the crossing line patrol.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredCrossingHandler: Perform corresponding processing on the current crossing.
BanBao.fiveWayInfraredUltrasonicJudgeEve: Execute user events when a given measurement range is detected during infrared line patrol.
